00048 static const QString SPACE = QString("&nbsp;");
00049 static const QString INDENT = QString("&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;");
00050 static const QString TABLE = QString("<table frame=\"box\" rules=\"all\""
00051                                                                          "border=\"1\" cellPadding=\"3\" title=\"");
00052 
00053 static const QString ENCODING = QString("<meta http-equiv=\"Content-Type\""
00054                                                                                 "content=\"text/html; charset=utf-8\">");
00055 
00056 static const QString DOCTYPE = QString("<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC \"-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN\" "
00057                                                                            "\"http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd\">");

00059 static const QString VALID_W3C_STRICT = QString("\t\t<p>\n"
00060                                                                                                 "\t\t\t<a href=\"http://validator.w3.org/check?uri=referer\">\n"
00061                                                                                                 "\t\t\t<img src=\"http://www.w3.org/Icons/valid-html401\""

00081 DocumentGenerator::DocumentGenerator( LibraryInterface* handler, 
00082                                                                          const VLNV& vlnv,
00083                                                                          QList<VLNV>& objects,
00084                                                                          DocumentGenerator* parent ):
00085 QObject(parent),
00086 handler_(handler),
00087 component_(),
00088 myNumber_(0),
00089 childInstances_(),
00090 targetPath_(),
00091 parent_(NULL) {
00092 
00093         Q_ASSERT(handler_);
00094         Q_ASSERT(parent);
00095         Q_ASSERT(handler_->contains(vlnv));
00096         Q_ASSERT(handler_->getDocumentType(vlnv) == VLNV::COMPONENT);
00097 
00098         connect(this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00099                 parent, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00100         connect(this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00101                 parent, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00102 
00103         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(vlnv);
00104         component_ = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00105 
00106         parseChildItems(objects);
00107 }

00110 }

00112 void DocumentGenerator::setComponent( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00113         Q_ASSERT(handler_->getDocumentType(vlnv) == VLNV::COMPONENT);
00114         
00115         // this function can be called for only the top document generator
00116         Q_ASSERT(parent_);
00117 
00118         // parse the model for the component
00119         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(vlnv);
00120         component_ = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00121 
00122         // list of objects that have already been processed to avoid duplicates
00123         QList<VLNV> objects;
00124         objects.append(vlnv);
00125 
00126         parseChildItems(objects);
00127 }
00128 
00129 void DocumentGenerator::parseChildItems( QList<VLNV>& objects ) {
00130 
00131         // ask the component for it's hierarchical references
00132         QList<VLNV> refs = component_->getHierRefs();
00133         foreach (VLNV ref, refs) {
00134                 QSharedPointer<Design> design = handler_->getDesign(ref);
00135                 if (!design)
00136                         continue;
00137 
00138                 QList<Design::ComponentInstance> instances = design->getComponentInstances();
00139                 foreach (Design::ComponentInstance const& instance, instances) {
00140 
00141                         // if the component has already been processed
00142                         if (objects.contains(instance.componentRef)) {
00143                                 continue;
00144                         }
00145                         // if the referenced component is not found.
00146                         else if (!handler_->contains(instance.componentRef)) {
00147                                 continue;
00148                         }
00149                         // if instance reference is not for a component
00150                         else if (handler_->getDocumentType(instance.componentRef) != VLNV::COMPONENT) {
00151                                 continue;
00152                         }
00153 
00154                         // create a new instance of document generator and add it to child list
00155                         objects.append(instance.componentRef);
00156                         QSharedPointer<DocumentGenerator> docGenerator(new DocumentGenerator(
00157                                 handler_, instance.componentRef, objects, this));
00158                         childInstances_.append(docGenerator);
00159                 }
00160         }
00161 }
00162 
00163 QString DocumentGenerator::writeDocumentation() {
00164         Q_ASSERT(component_);
00165         Q_ASSERT(handler_->contains(*component_->getVlnv()));
00166         Q_ASSERT(handler_->getDocumentType(*component_->getVlnv()) == VLNV::COMPONENT);
00167 
00168         // this function can only be called for the top document generator
00169         Q_ASSERT(parent_);
00170 
00171         // find the path to the component's xml file
00172         const QString xmlPath = handler_->getPath(*component_->getVlnv());
00173         // create the default path for the documentation file
00174         QFileInfo xmlInfo(xmlPath);
00175         
00176         targetPath_ = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(NULL, 
00177                 tr("Save the documentation to..."), xmlInfo.absolutePath(),
00178                 tr("web pages (*.html)"));
00179 
00180         // if user clicked cancel
00181         if (targetPath_.isEmpty())
00182                 return QString();
00183 
00184         QFile targetFile(targetPath_);
00185 
00186         // if file can not be opened for writing
00187         if (!targetFile.open(QFile::WriteOnly)) {
00188                 emit errorMessage(tr("Could not open file %1 for writing.").arg(targetPath_));
00189                 return QString();
00190         }
00191         QTextStream stream(&targetFile);
00192 
00193         // contains the username needed to write the top header
00194         QSettings settings;
00195 
00196         // write the top of the html document
00197         stream << DOCTYPE << endl;
00198         stream << "<html>" << endl;
00199         stream << "\t<head>" << endl;
00200         stream << "\t" << ENCODING << endl;
00201         stream << "\t\t<title>Kactus2 generated documentation for component " <<
00202                 component_->getVlnv()->getName() << " " 
00203                 << component_->getVlnv()->getVersion() << "</title>" << endl;
00204         stream << "\t</head>" << endl;
00205         stream << "\t<body>" << endl;
00206         stream << "\t\t<h6>This document was generated by Kactus2 on " <<
00207                 QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString("dd.MM.yyyy hh:mm:ss") << " by user " <<
00208                 settings.value("general/username", getenv("USERNAME")).toString() << "</h6>" << endl;
00209 
00210         // create a running number to create the numbered headers for table of contents
00211         unsigned int runningNumber = 0;
00212 
00213         stream << "\t\t<p>" << endl;
00214         stream << "\t\t<strong>Table of contents</strong><br>" << endl;
00215         // write the table of contents for this top component
00216         writeTableOfContents(runningNumber, stream);
00217         stream << "\t\t</p>" << endl;
00218 
00219         QStringList pictureList;
00220 
00221         // write the actual documentation for the top component
00222         writeDocumentation(stream, targetPath_, pictureList);
00223 
00224         stream << VALID_W3C_STRICT << endl;
00225         stream << "\t</body>" << endl;
00226         stream << "</html>" << endl;
00227 
00228         targetFile.close();
00229 
00230         // ask user if he wants to save the generated documentation into 
00231         // object metadata
00232         QMessageBox::StandardButton button = QMessageBox::question(parent_, 
00233                 tr("Save generated documentation to metadata?"),
00234                 tr("Would you like to save the generated documentation to IP-Xact"
00235                 " metadata?"), QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No, QMessageBox::Yes);
00236 
00237         // if the generated file is saved
00238         if (button == QMessageBox::Yes) {
00239 
00240                 QString xmlPath = handler_->getPath(*component_->getVlnv());
00241 
00242                 // get the relative path to add to file set
00243                 QString relativePath = General::getRelativePath(xmlPath, targetPath_);
00244 
00245                 QString fileSetName("Documentation");
00246                 FileSet* documentationFileSet = component_->getFileSet(fileSetName);
00247 
00248                 // if the documentation file set was not found. Create one
00249                 if (!documentationFileSet) {
00250                         documentationFileSet = new FileSet(fileSetName, QString("documentation"));
00251                         component_->addFileSet(documentationFileSet);
00252                 }
00253 
00254                 // create a new file
00255                 File* docFile = new File(relativePath, documentationFileSet);
00256                 docFile->addUserFileType(QString("htmlFile"));
00257                 docFile->setIncludeFile(false);
00258                 docFile->setDescription(tr("Html file that contains the documentation "
00259                         "for this component and subcomponents"));
00260 
00261                 // add the new file to the file set
00262                 documentationFileSet->addFile(docFile);
00263 
00264                 // add all created pictures to the file set
00265                 foreach (QString pictureName, pictureList) {
00266                         QString relativePicPath = General::getRelativePath(xmlPath, pictureName);
00267 
00268                         File* picFile = new File(relativePicPath, documentationFileSet);
00269                         picFile->addUserFileType(tr("picture"));
00270                         picFile->setIncludeFile(false);
00271                         picFile->setDescription(tr("Preview picture needed by the html document."));
00272                         documentationFileSet->addFile(picFile);
00273                 }
00274 
00275                 handler_->writeModelToFile(component_);
00276         }
00277 
00278         return targetPath_;
00279 }
00280 
00281 void DocumentGenerator::writeTableOfContents(unsigned int& componentNumber,
00282                                                                                          QTextStream& stream ) {
00283         // increase the running number and save this instance's number
00284         ++componentNumber;
00285         myNumber_ = componentNumber;
00286 
00287         stream << "\t\t<a href=\"#" << component_->getVlnv()->toString() << "\">" 
00288                 << myNumber_ << ". Component" << SPACE << component_->getVlnv()->getVendor() << " - " <<
00289                 component_->getVlnv()->getLibrary() << " - " << 
00290                 component_->getVlnv()->getName() << " - " <<
00291                 component_->getVlnv()->getVersion()
00292                 << "</a><br>" << endl;
00293         
00294         // subHeader is running number that counts the number of sub headers for component
00295         int subHeader = 1;
00296 
00297         if (component_->hasModelParameters()) {
00298                 stream << "\t\t" << INDENT << "<a href=\"#" << component_->getVlnv()->toString() <<
00299                         ".modelParams" << "\">" << myNumber_ << "." << subHeader << 
00300                         ". Model parameters</a><br>" << endl;
00301                 ++subHeader;
00302         }
00303 
00304         // component always has kactus parameters
00305         stream << "\t\t" << INDENT << "<a href=\"#" << component_->getVlnv()->toString() << 
00306                 ".kts_params" << "\">" << myNumber_ << "." << subHeader <<
00307                 ". Kactus2 attributes</a><br>" << endl;
00308         ++subHeader;
00309 
00310         if (component_->hasParameters()) {
00311                 stream << "\t\t" << INDENT << "<a href=\"#" << component_->getVlnv()->toString() <<
00312                         ".parameters" << "\">" << myNumber_ << "." << subHeader <<
00313                         ". General parameters</a><br>" << endl;
00314                 ++subHeader;
00315         }
00316 
00317         if (component_->hasPorts()) {
00318                 stream << "\t\t" << INDENT << "<a href=\"#" << component_->getVlnv()->toString() <<
00319                         ".ports" << "\">" << myNumber_ << "." << subHeader <<
00320                         ". Ports</a><br>" << endl;
00321                 ++subHeader;
00322         }
00323 
00324         if (component_->hasInterfaces()) {
00325                 stream << "\t\t" << INDENT << "<a href=\"#" << component_->getVlnv()->toString() <<
00326                         ".interfaces" << "\">" << myNumber_ << "." << subHeader <<
00327                         ". Bus interfaces</a><br>" << endl;
00328                 ++subHeader;
00329         }
00330 
00331         if (component_->hasFileSets()) {
00332                 stream << "\t\t" << INDENT << "<a href=\"#" << component_->getVlnv()->toString() <<
00333                         ".fileSets" << "\">" << myNumber_ << "." << subHeader <<
00334                         ". File sets</a><br>" << endl;
00335                 ++subHeader;
00336         }
00337 
00338         if (component_->hasViews()) {
00339                 stream << "\t\t" << INDENT << "<a href=\"#" << component_->getVlnv()->toString() <<
00340                         ".views" << "\">" << myNumber_ << "." << subHeader <<
00341                         ". Views</a><br>" << endl;
00342         }
00343 
00344         // tell each child to write it's table of contents
00345         foreach (QSharedPointer<DocumentGenerator> generator, childInstances_) {
00346                 generator->writeTableOfContents(componentNumber, stream);
00347         }
00348 }
00349 
00350 void DocumentGenerator::writeDocumentation(QTextStream& stream, const QString& targetPath,
00351                                                                                    QStringList& filesToInclude) {
00352         
00353         targetPath_ = targetPath;
00354         
00355         // write the component header
00356         stream << "\t\t<h1><a id=\"" << component_->getVlnv()->toString() << "\">" << myNumber_ <<
00357                 ". Component " << component_->getVlnv()->toString(" - ") << "</a></h1>" << endl;
00358 
00359         createComponentPicture(filesToInclude);
00360 
00361         stream << "\t\t<p>" << endl;
00362 
00363         stream << "\t\t<img src=\"" << component_->getVlnv()->toString(".") << ".png\""
00364                 " alt=\"" << component_->getVlnv()->toString(" - ") << " preview picture\"><br>" << endl;
00365 
00366         // if component has description, write it
00367         if (!component_->getDescription().isEmpty()) {
00368                 stream << "\t\t<strong>Description:</strong> " << component_->getDescription() 
00369                         << "<br>" << endl;
00370         }
00371 
00372         // print relative path to the xml file
00373         QFileInfo compXmlInfo(handler_->getPath(*component_->getVlnv()));
00374         QString relativeXmlPath = General::getRelativePath(targetPath_, compXmlInfo.absoluteFilePath());
00375         stream << "\t\t<strong>IP-Xact file: </strong><a href=\"" << 
00376                 relativeXmlPath << "\">" << compXmlInfo.fileName() <<
00377                 "</a><br>" << endl;
00378         
00379         stream << "\t\t</p>" << endl;
00380 
00381         int subHeaderNumber = 1;
00382         writeModelParameters(stream, subHeaderNumber);
00383         writeParameters(stream, subHeaderNumber);
00384         writePorts(stream, subHeaderNumber);
00385         writeInterfaces(stream, subHeaderNumber);
00386         writeFileSets(stream, subHeaderNumber);
00387         writeViews(stream, subHeaderNumber, filesToInclude);
00388 
00389         // tell each child to write it's documentation
00390         foreach (QSharedPointer<DocumentGenerator> generator, childInstances_) {
00391                 generator->writeDocumentation(stream, targetPath, filesToInclude);
00392         }
00393 }

00395 void DocumentGenerator::writeModelParameters(QTextStream& stream, int& subHeaderNumber) {
00396         if (component_->hasModelParameters()) {
00397                 
00398                 writeSubHeader(subHeaderNumber, stream, "Model parameters", "modelParams");
00399 
00400                 QStringList paramHeaders;
00401                 paramHeaders.append("Name");
00402                 paramHeaders.append("Data type");
00403                 paramHeaders.append("Default value");
00404                 paramHeaders.append("Description");
00405                 writeTableElement(paramHeaders, 
00406                         "List of model parameters defined for the component",
00407                         stream);
00408                 const QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> > modelParams = component_->getModelParameters();
00409                 foreach (QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> param, modelParams) {
00410                         stream << "\t\t\t\t<tr>" << endl;
00411                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << param->getName() << "</td>" << endl;
00412                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << param->getDataType() << "</td>" << endl;
00413                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << param->getValue() << "</td>" << endl;
00414                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << param->getDescription() << "</td>" << endl;
00415                         stream << "\t\t\t\t</tr>" << endl;
00416                 }
00417 
00418                 stream << "\t\t\t</table>" << endl;
00419                 ++subHeaderNumber;
00420         }
00421 }
00422 
00423 void DocumentGenerator::writeParameters(QTextStream& stream, int& subHeaderNumber) {
00424         // write the kactus 2 parameters
00425         
00426         writeSubHeader(subHeaderNumber, stream, "Kactus2 attributes", "kts_params");
00427         
00428         stream << "\t\t<p>" << endl;
00429         stream << "\t\t\t<strong>" << INDENT << "Product hierarchy: </strong>" <<
00430                 KactusAttribute::valueToString(component_->getComponentHierarchy()) <<
00431                 "<br>" << endl;
00432         
00433         stream << "\t\t\t<strong>" << INDENT << "Component implementation: </strong>" <<
00434                 KactusAttribute::valueToString(component_->getComponentImplementation()) <<
00435                 "<br>" << endl;
00436 
00437         stream << "\t\t\t<strong>" << INDENT << "Component firmness: </strong>" <<
00438                 KactusAttribute::valueToString(component_->getComponentFirmness()) <<
00439                 "<br>" << endl;
00440 
00441         stream << "\t\t</p>" << endl;
00442         ++subHeaderNumber;
00443 
00444         if (component_->hasParameters()) {
00445                 writeSubHeader(subHeaderNumber, stream, "General parameters", "parameters");
00446 
00447                 QStringList paramHeaders;
00448                 paramHeaders.append("Name");
00449                 paramHeaders.append("Value");
00450                 paramHeaders.append("Description");
00451                 writeTableElement(paramHeaders,
00452                         "List of parameters defined for the component", stream);
00453                 QList<QSharedPointer<Parameter> > params = component_->getParameters();
00454                 foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, params) {
00455                         stream << "\t\t\t\t<tr>" << endl;
00456                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << param->getName() << "</td>" << endl;
00457                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << param->getValue() << "</td>" << endl;
00458                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << param->getDescription() << "</td>" << endl;
00459                         stream << "\t\t\t\t</tr>" << endl;
00460                 }
00461                 stream << "\t\t\t</table>" << endl;
00462                 ++subHeaderNumber;
00463         }
00464 }

00466 void DocumentGenerator::writePorts(QTextStream& stream, int& subHeaderNumber) {
00467 
00468         if (component_->hasPorts()) {
00469                 writeSubHeader(subHeaderNumber, stream, "Ports", "ports");
00470 
00471                 QStringList portHeaders;
00472                 portHeaders.append("Name");
00473                 portHeaders.append("Direction");
00474                 portHeaders.append("Width");
00475                 portHeaders.append("Left bound");
00476                 portHeaders.append("Right bound");
00477                 portHeaders.append("Port type");
00478                 portHeaders.append("Type definition");
00479                 portHeaders.append("Default value");
00480                 portHeaders.append("Description");
00481                 writeTableElement(portHeaders, 
00482                         "List of all ports the component has.", stream);
00483                 const QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<Port> > ports = component_->getPorts();
00484                 foreach (QSharedPointer<Port> port, ports) {
00485                         stream << "\t\t\t\t<tr>" << endl;
00486                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td><a id=\"" << 
00487                                 component_->getVlnv()->toString() << ".port." << port->getName() << 
00488                                 "\">" <<  port->getName() << "</a></td>" << endl;
00489                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << General::direction2Str(port->getDirection()) << "</td>" << endl;
00490                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << port->getPortSize() << "</td>" << endl;
00491                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << port->getLeftBound() << "</td>" << endl;
00492                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << port->getRightBound() << "</td>" << endl;
00493                         const QString typeName = port->getTypeName();
00494                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << typeName << "</td>" << endl;
00495                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << port->getTypeDefinition(typeName) << "</td>" << endl;
00496                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << port->getDefaultValue() << "</td>" << endl;
00497                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << port->getDescription() << "</td>" << endl;
00498                         stream << "\t\t\t\t</tr>" << endl;
00499                 }
00500 
00501                 stream << "\t\t\t</table>" << endl;
00502                 ++subHeaderNumber;
00503         }
00504 }

00506 void DocumentGenerator::writeInterfaces(QTextStream& stream, int& subHeaderNumber) {
00507         if (component_->hasInterfaces()) {
00508                 
00509                 writeSubHeader(subHeaderNumber, stream, "Bus interfaces", "interfaces");
00510 
00511                 const QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<BusInterface> > interfaces = component_->getBusInterfaces();
00512                 int interfaceNumber = 1;
00513                 foreach (QSharedPointer<BusInterface> interface, interfaces) {
00514                         stream << "\t\t\t" << "<h3>" << myNumber_ << "." << subHeaderNumber << "." << interfaceNumber++ <<
00515                                 " " << interface->getName() << "</h3>" << endl;
00516                         
00517                         stream << "\t\t\t<p>" << endl;
00518 
00519                         // if interface has a description
00520                         if (!interface->getDescription().isEmpty()) {
00521                                 stream << "\t\t\t" << INDENT << "<strong>Description:</strong> " << 
00522                                         interface->getDescription() << "<br>" << endl;
00523                         }
00524 
00525                         // write the interface mode of the interface
00526                         stream << "\t\t\t" << INDENT << "<strong>Interface mode:</strong> " << 
00527                                 General::interfaceMode2Str(interface->getInterfaceMode()) << "<br>" << endl;
00528 
00529                         stream << "\t\t\t" << INDENT << "<strong>Ports used in this interface:</strong>" << endl;
00530 
00531                         stream << "\t\t\t</p>" << endl;
00532 
00533 //                      stream << "\t\t\t<ul>" << endl;
00534 //                      QStringList physPortList = interface->getPhysicalPortNames();
00535 //                      foreach (QString physPort, physPortList) {
00536 //                              stream << "\t\t\t\t<li><a href=\"#" << component_->getVlnv()->toString() 
00537 //                                      << ".port." << physPort << "\">" << physPort << "</a></li>" << endl;
00538 //                      }
00539 // 
00540 //                      stream << "\t\t\t</ul>" << endl;
00541 //                      
00542                         QStringList portHeaders;
00543                         portHeaders.append("Name");
00544                         portHeaders.append("Direction");
00545                         portHeaders.append("Width");
00546                         portHeaders.append("Left bound");
00547                         portHeaders.append("Right bound");
00548                         portHeaders.append("Port type");
00549                         portHeaders.append("Type definition");
00550                         portHeaders.append("Default value");
00551                         portHeaders.append("Description");
00552                         writeTableElement(portHeaders, 
00553                                 QString("List of ports contained in interface %1.").arg(interface->getName()), stream);
00554                         const QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<Port> > ports = component_->getPorts(interface->getName());
00555                         foreach (QSharedPointer<Port> port, ports) {
00556                                 stream << "\t\t\t\t<tr>" << endl;
00557                                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td><a id=\"" << 
00558                                         component_->getVlnv()->toString() << ".port." << port->getName() << 
00559                                         "\">" <<  port->getName() << "</a></td>" << endl;
00560                                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << General::direction2Str(port->getDirection()) << "</td>" << endl;
00561                                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << port->getPortSize() << "</td>" << endl;
00562                                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << port->getLeftBound() << "</td>" << endl;
00563                                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << port->getRightBound() << "</td>" << endl;
00564                                 const QString typeName = port->getTypeName();
00565                                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << typeName << "</td>" << endl;
00566                                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << port->getTypeDefinition(typeName) << "</td>" << endl;
00567                                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << port->getDefaultValue() << "</td>" << endl;
00568                                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << port->getDescription() << "</td>" << endl;
00569                                 stream << "\t\t\t\t</tr>" << endl;
00570                         }
00571 
00572                         stream << "\t\t\t</table>" << endl;
00573 
00574                 }
00575                 ++subHeaderNumber;
00576         }
00577 }
00578 
00579 void DocumentGenerator::writeFileSets(QTextStream& stream, int& subHeaderNumber) {
00580         if (component_->hasFileSets()) {
00581                 
00582                 writeSubHeader(subHeaderNumber, stream, "File sets", "fileSets");
00583 
00584                 const QList<QSharedPointer<FileSet> > fileSets = component_->getFileSets();
00585                 int fileSetNumber = 1;
00586                 foreach (QSharedPointer<FileSet> fileSet, fileSets) {
00587                         stream << "\t\t\t" << "<h3><a id=\"" << component_->getVlnv()->toString() 
00588                                 << ".fileSet." << fileSet->getName() << "\">" << myNumber_ << "." << subHeaderNumber << 
00589                                 "." << fileSetNumber << " " << fileSet->getName() << "</a></h3>" << endl;
00590 
00591                         stream << "\t\t\t<p>" << endl;
00592 
00593                         // if file set has a description
00594                         if (!fileSet->getDescription().isEmpty()) {
00595                                 stream << "\t\t\t" << INDENT << "<strong>Description:</strong> " << 
00596                                         fileSet->getDescription() << "<br>" << endl;
00597                         }
00598 
00599                         // write the group identifiers
00600                         QStringList groups = fileSet->getGroups();
00601                         stream << "\t\t\t" << INDENT << "<strong>Identifiers:</strong> ";
00602                         for (int i = 0; i < groups.size(); ++i) {
00603                                 stream << groups.at(i);
00604 
00605                                 // if this is not the last group identifier
00606                                 if (i != groups.size()-1)
00607                                         stream << ", ";
00608                         }
00609                         stream << "<br>" << endl;
00610 
00611                         // if file set has specified default file builders
00612                         QList<QSharedPointer<FileBuilder> > fileBuilders = fileSet->getDefaultFileBuilders();
00613                         if (!fileBuilders.isEmpty()) {  
00614                                 stream << "\t\t\t" << INDENT << "<strong>Default file builders:</strong>" << endl;
00615 
00616                                 stream << "\t\t\t</p>" << endl;
00617 
00618                                 QStringList builderHeaders;
00619                                 builderHeaders.append("File type");
00620                                 builderHeaders.append("Command");
00621                                 builderHeaders.append("Flags");
00622                                 builderHeaders.append("Replace default flags");
00623                                 writeTableElement(builderHeaders, "The build settings for files in this file set.",
00624                                         stream);
00625 
00626                                 foreach (QSharedPointer<FileBuilder> fileBuilder, fileBuilders) {
00627                                         stream << "\t\t\t\t<tr>" << endl;
00628                                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << fileBuilder->getFileType() << "</td>" << endl;
00629                                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << fileBuilder->getCommand() << "</td>" << endl;
00630                                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << fileBuilder->getFlags() << "</td>" << endl;
00631                                         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << 
00632                                                 General::bool2Str(fileBuilder->getReplaceDefaultFlags()) << "</td>" << endl;
00633                                         stream << "\t\t\t\t</tr>" << endl;
00634                                 }
00635                                 stream << "\t\t\t</table>" << endl;
00636                         }
00637                         else {
00638                                 stream << "\t\t\t</p>" << endl;
00639                         }
00640 
00641                         stream << "\t\t\t" << "<h4>" << INDENT << myNumber_ << "." << subHeaderNumber <<
00642                                 "." << fileSetNumber << ".1 Files</h4>" << endl;
00643 
00644                         QStringList fileHeaders;
00645                         fileHeaders.append("File name");
00646                         fileHeaders.append("Logical name");
00647                         fileHeaders.append("Build command");
00648                         fileHeaders.append("Build flags");
00649                         fileHeaders.append("Specified file types");
00650                         fileHeaders.append("Description");
00651                         writeTableElement(fileHeaders, "List of files contained in this file set.", stream);
00652 
00653                         // get the files contained in this file set.
00654                         const QList<QSharedPointer<File> > files = fileSet->getFiles();
00655                         foreach (QSharedPointer<File> file, files) {
00656                                 writeFile(file, stream);
00657                         }
00658                         stream << "\t\t\t</table>" << endl;
00659 
00660                         ++fileSetNumber;
00661                 }
00662                 ++subHeaderNumber;
00663         }
00664 }
00665 
00666 void DocumentGenerator::writeViews( QTextStream& stream, int& subHeaderNumber,
00667                                                                    QStringList& pictureList ) {
00668         if (component_->hasViews()) {
00669                 stream << "\t\t\t<h2><a id=\"" << component_->getVlnv()->toString() << ".views\">"
00670                         << myNumber_ << "." << subHeaderNumber << " Views</a></h2>" << endl;
00671                 
00672                 const QList<QSharedPointer<View> > views = component_->getViews();
00673                 int viewNumber = 1;
00674                 foreach (QSharedPointer<View> view, views) {
00675                         
00676                         stream << "\t\t\t<h3>" << myNumber_ << "." << subHeaderNumber <<
00677                                 "." << viewNumber << " View: " << view->getName() << "</h3>" << endl;
00678 
00679                         stream << "\t\t\t<p>" << endl;
00680 
00681                         bool isHierarchicalView = view->isHierarchical();
00682                         if (isHierarchicalView) {
00683                                 createDesignPicture(pictureList, view->getName());
00684 
00685                                 stream << "\t\t\t<img src=\"" << component_->getVlnv()->toString(".")
00686                                         << "." << view->getName() << ".png\" alt=\"" << "View: " <<
00687                                         view->getName() << " preview picture\"><br>" << endl;
00688                         }
00689 
00690                         stream << "\t\t\t<strong>" << INDENT << "Type: </strong>";
00691                         
00692                         if (isHierarchicalView) {
00693                                 stream << "hierarchical" << "<br>" << endl;
00694                         }
00695                         else {
00696                                 stream << "non-hierarchical" << "<br>" << endl;
00697                         }
00698 
00699                         // if view has description
00700                         if (!view->getDescription().isEmpty()) {
00701                                 stream << "\t\t\t<strong>Description: </strong>" << view->getDescription() 
00702                                         << "<br>" << endl;
00703                         }
00704 
00705                         // if view is hierarchical
00706                         if (isHierarchicalView) {
00707                                 stream << "\t\t\t</p>" << endl;
00708 
00709                                 writeView(view, stream, subHeaderNumber, viewNumber);
00710                         }
00711 
00712                         // if is flat view
00713                         else {
00714                                 QStringList fileSetRefs = view->getFileSetRefs();
00715                                 if (!fileSetRefs.isEmpty()) {
00716                                         stream << "\t\t\t<strong>" << INDENT << "File sets contained in this view: </strong>" << endl;
00717                                         
00718                                         stream << "\t\t\t</p>" << endl;
00719                                         
00720                                         stream << "\t\t\t<ul>" << endl;
00721                                         foreach (QString fileSetRef, fileSetRefs) {
00722                                                 stream << "\t\t\t\t<li><a href=\"#" << 
00723                                                         component_->getVlnv()->toString() << ".fileSet." << fileSetRef
00724                                                         << "\">" << fileSetRef << "</a></li>" << endl;
00725                                         }
00726                                         stream << "\t\t\t</ul>" << endl;
00727                                 }
00728                         }
00729                         ++viewNumber;
00730                 }
00731                 ++subHeaderNumber;
00732         }
00733 }
00734 
00735 void DocumentGenerator::writeView( QSharedPointer<View> view, 
00736                                                                   QTextStream& stream, 
00737                                                                   const int subheaderNumber, 
00738                                                                   const int viewNumber ) {
00739         
00740         VLNV vlnv = view->getHierarchyRef();
00741         
00742         // if vlnv was not found in library
00743         if (!handler_->contains(vlnv)) {
00744                 QString errorMsg(tr("VLNV: %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in library.").arg(
00745                         vlnv.getVendor()).arg(
00746                         vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(
00747                         vlnv.getName()).arg(
00748                         vlnv.getVersion()));
00749 
00750                 stream << "\t\t\t<p>" << endl;
00751                 stream << "\t\t\t<strong>" << errorMsg << "</strong><br>" << endl;
00752                 stream << "\t\t\t</p>" << endl;
00753                 emit errorMessage(errorMsg);
00754                 return;
00755         }
00756 
00757         QSharedPointer<Design> design;
00758         QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> desConf;
00759         VLNV designVLNV;
00760         VLNV desConfVLNV;
00761 
00762         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(vlnv);
00763         
00764         // if the hierarchical reference was for design configuration
00765         if (handler_->getDocumentType(vlnv) == VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION) {
00766                 desConf = libComp.staticCast<DesignConfiguration>();
00767                 desConfVLNV = *desConf->getVlnv();
00768 
00769                 designVLNV = desConf->getDesignRef();
00770                 // if design vlnv was not found in library
00771                 if (!handler_->contains(designVLNV)) {
00772                         QString errorMsg(tr("VLNV: %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in library.").arg(
00773                                 designVLNV.getVendor()).arg(designVLNV.getLibrary()).arg(designVLNV.getName()).arg(
00774                                 designVLNV.getVersion()));
00775 
00776                         stream << "\t\t\t<p>" << endl;
00777                         stream << "\t\t\t<strong>" << errorMsg << "</strong><br>" << endl;
00778                         stream << "\t\t\t</p>" << endl;
00779                         emit errorMessage(errorMsg);
00780                         return;
00781                 }
00782                 // if the vlnv is not for design
00783                 else if (handler_->getDocumentType(designVLNV) != VLNV::DESIGN) {
00784                         QString errorMsg(tr("VLNV: %1:%2:%3:%4 was not for design.").arg(
00785                                 designVLNV.getVendor()).arg(designVLNV.getLibrary()).arg(designVLNV.getName()).arg(
00786                                 designVLNV.getVersion()));
00787 
00788                         stream << "\t\t\t<p>" << endl;
00789                         stream << "\t\t\t<strong>" << errorMsg << "</strong><br>" << endl;
00790                         stream << "\t\t\t</p>" << endl;
00791                         emit errorMessage(errorMsg);
00792                         return;
00793                 }
00794                 
00795                 libComp = handler_->getModel(designVLNV);
00796                 design = libComp.staticCast<Design>();
00797                 designVLNV = *design->getVlnv();
00798         }
00799 
00800         // if the hierarchical reference was directly for a design
00801         else if (handler_->getDocumentType(vlnv) == VLNV::DESIGN) {
00802                 libComp = handler_->getModel(vlnv);
00803                 design = libComp.staticCast<Design>();
00804                 designVLNV = *design->getVlnv();
00805         }
00806         
00807         // if hierarchical reference was for wrong type
00808         else {
00809                 QString errorMsg(tr("VLNV: %1:%2:%3:%4 was not for design or design configuration.").arg(
00810                         vlnv.getVendor()).arg(vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(vlnv.getName()).arg(
00811                         vlnv.getVersion()));
00812 
00813                 stream << "\t\t\t<p>" << endl;
00814                 stream << "\t\t\t<strong>" << errorMsg << "</strong><br>" << endl;
00815                 stream << "\t\t\t</p>" << endl;
00816                 emit errorMessage(errorMsg);
00817                 return;
00818         }
00819 
00820         // if design configuration was used
00821         if (desConf) {
00822                 stream << "\t\t\t<h4>" << myNumber_ << "." << subheaderNumber << "." <<
00823                         viewNumber << ".1 Configuration " << desConfVLNV.toString(" - ") << 
00824                         "</h4>" << endl;
00825                 
00826                 stream << "\t\t\t<p>" << endl;
00827                 // if configuration has a description
00828                 if (!desConf->getDescription().isEmpty()) {
00829                         stream << "\t\t\t<strong>" << INDENT << "Description: </strong>" << desConf->getDescription() <<
00830                                 "<br>" << endl;
00831                 }
00832 
00833                 // print relative path to the configuration xml file
00834                 QFileInfo confXmlInfo(handler_->getPath(desConfVLNV));
00835                 QString relativeXmlPath = General::getRelativePath(targetPath_, confXmlInfo.absoluteFilePath());
00836                 stream << "\t\t\t<strong>" << INDENT << "IP-Xact file: </strong><a href=\"" << 
00837                         relativeXmlPath << "\">" << confXmlInfo.fileName() <<
00838                         "</a><br>" << endl;
00839                 stream << "\t\t\t<br>" << endl;
00840                 
00841                 stream << "\t\t\t</p>" << endl;
00842         }
00843 
00844         Q_ASSERT(design);
00845 
00846         stream << "\t\t\t<h4>" << myNumber_ << "." << subheaderNumber << "." <<
00847                 viewNumber << ".2 Design " << designVLNV.toString(" - ") << "</h4>" << endl;
00848         
00849         stream << "\t\t\t<p>" << endl;
00850 
00851         // if design contains a description
00852         if (!design->getDescription().isEmpty()) {
00853                 stream << "\t\t\t<strong>" << INDENT << "Description: </strong>" << design->getDescription() <<
00854                         "<br>" << endl;
00855         }
00856 
00857         // print relative path to the design xml file
00858         QFileInfo designXmlInfo(handler_->getPath(designVLNV));
00859         QString relativeXmlPath = General::getRelativePath(targetPath_, designXmlInfo.absoluteFilePath());
00860         stream << "\t\t\t<strong>" << INDENT << "IP-Xact file: </strong><a href=\"" << 
00861                 relativeXmlPath << "\">" << designXmlInfo.fileName() <<
00862                 "</a><br>" << endl;
00863         stream << "\t\t\t<br>" << endl;
00864 
00865         stream << "\t\t\t</p>" << endl;
00866 
00867         const QList<Design::ComponentInstance> instances = design->getComponentInstances();
00868         
00869         // if design does not contain instances
00870         if (instances.isEmpty()) {
00871                 return;
00872         }
00873 
00874         QStringList instanceHeaders;
00875         instanceHeaders.append("Instance name");
00876         instanceHeaders.append("Component type");
00877         instanceHeaders.append("Configurable values");
00878         instanceHeaders.append("Active view");
00879         instanceHeaders.append("Description");
00880         writeTableElement(instanceHeaders, "Component instantiations within this design", stream);
00881 
00882         foreach (Design::ComponentInstance const& instance, instances) {
00883                 stream << "\t\t\t\t<tr>" << endl;
00884 
00885                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << instance.instanceName << "</td>" << endl;
00886                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td><a href=\"#" << instance.componentRef.toString(":") 
00887                         << "\">" << instance.componentRef.toString(" - ") << "</a></td>" << endl;
00888                 
00889                 // write the configurable element values of the instance
00890                 QMap<QString, QString> confElements = instance.configurableElementValues;
00891                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << endl;
00892                 for (QMap<QString, QString>::iterator i = confElements.begin();
00893                         i != confElements.end(); ++i) {
00894                                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t" << i.key() << " = " << i.value();
00895                                 
00896                                 // if this is not the last configurable value
00897                                 if (i != --confElements.end()) {
00898                                         stream << "<br>";
00899                                 }
00900                                 stream << endl;
00901                 }
00902                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t</td>" << endl;
00903 
00904                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>";
00905                 if (desConf) {
00906                         stream << desConf->getActiveView(instance.instanceName);
00907                 }
00908                 stream << "</td>" << endl;
00909 
00910                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << instance.description << "</td>" << endl;
00911 
00912                 stream << "\t\t\t\t</tr>" << endl;
00913         }
00914 
00915         stream << "\t\t\t</table>" << endl; 
00916 }
00917 
00918 void DocumentGenerator::writeSubHeader( const int headerNumber, 
00919                                                                            QTextStream& stream, 
00920                                                                            const QString& text,
00921                                                                            const QString& headerID) {
00922 
00923    stream << "\t\t<h2><a id=\"" << component_->getVlnv()->toString() << "." <<
00924            headerID << "\">" << myNumber_ << "." << headerNumber << " " << text <<
00925            "</a></h2>" << endl;
00926 }
00927 
00928 void DocumentGenerator::writeTableElement( const QStringList& headers, 
00929                                                                                   const QString& title,
00930                                                                                   QTextStream& stream ) {
00931         stream << "\t\t\t" << TABLE << title << "\">" << endl; 
00932         stream << "\t\t\t\t<tr>" << endl;
00933         foreach (QString header, headers) {
00934                 stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<th>" << header << "</th>" << endl;
00935         }
00936         stream << "\t\t\t\t</tr>";
00937 }
00938 
00939 void DocumentGenerator::writeFile( QSharedPointer<File> file,
00940                                                                   QTextStream& stream ) {
00941         
00942         // get absolute path to the file
00943         QString relativeFilePath = file->getName();
00944         QString absFilePath = General::getAbsolutePath(handler_->getPath(*component_->getVlnv()), relativeFilePath);
00945         QFileInfo fileInfo(absFilePath);
00946 
00947         // get relative path from html file to the file
00948         QFileInfo htmlInfo(targetPath_);
00949         QString pathFromhtmlToFile = General::getRelativePath(targetPath_, absFilePath);
00950 
00951         BuildCommand* buildCommand = file->getBuildcommand();
00952 
00953         QStringList fileTypes = file->getFileTypes();
00954         fileTypes += file->getUserFileTypes();
00955 
00956         stream << "\t\t\t\t<tr>" << endl;
00957         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td><a href=\"" << pathFromhtmlToFile << "\">" << 
00958                 fileInfo.fileName() << "</a></td>" << endl;
00959         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << file->getLogicalName() << "</td>" << endl;
00960         
00961         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>";
00962         if (buildCommand) {
00963                 stream << buildCommand->getCommand();
00964         }
00965         stream << "</td>" << endl;
00966 
00967         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>";
00968         if (buildCommand) {
00969                 stream << buildCommand->getFlags();
00970         }
00971         stream << "</td>" << endl;
00972         
00973         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>";
00974         for (int i = 0; i < fileTypes.size(); ++i) {
00975                 stream << fileTypes.at(i);
00976                 if (i != fileTypes.size() - 1) {
00977                         stream << ",<br>";
00978                 }
00979         }
00980         stream << "</td>" << endl;
00981         
00982         stream << "\t\t\t\t\t<td>" << file->getDescription() << "</td>" << endl;
00983         stream << "\t\t\t\t</tr>" << endl;
00984 }
00985 
00986 void DocumentGenerator::createComponentPicture(QStringList& pictureList) {
00987         ComponentPreviewBox compBox(handler_);
00988         compBox.hide();
00989         compBox.setComponent(component_);
00990 
00991         QFileInfo htmlInfo(targetPath_);
00992         QString compPicPath = htmlInfo.absolutePath(); 
00993         compPicPath += "/";
00994         compPicPath += component_->getVlnv()->toString(".");
00995         compPicPath += ".png";
00996 
00997         QFile compPicFile(compPicPath);
00998 
00999         // if there exists a previous file
01000         if (compPicFile.exists()) {
01001                 compPicFile.remove();
01002         }
01003 
01004         // get the rect that bounds all items on box
01005         QRectF boundingRect = compBox.itemsBoundingRect();
01006         boundingRect.setHeight(boundingRect.height() + 2);
01007         boundingRect.setWidth(boundingRect.width() + 2);
01008 
01009         // set the size of the picture
01010         QPixmap compPic(boundingRect.size().toSize());
01011 
01012         // create the picture for the component
01013         QPainter painter(&compPic);
01014         painter.fillRect(compPic.rect(), QBrush(Qt::white));
01015         compBox.scene()->render(&painter, compPic.rect(), boundingRect.toRect());
01016         if (!compPic.save(&compPicFile, "PNG")) {
01017                 emit errorMessage(tr("Could not save picture %1").arg(compPicPath));
01018         }
01019         else {
01020                 pictureList.append(compPicPath);
01021         }
01022         
01023 }
01024 
01025 void DocumentGenerator::createDesignPicture( QStringList& pictureList, 
01026                                                                                         const QString& viewName ) {
01027 
01028         DesignWidget designWidget(handler_);
01029         designWidget.hide();
01030         designWidget.setDesign(component_->getVlnv(), viewName);
01031 
01032         QFileInfo htmlInfo(targetPath_);
01033         QString designPicPath = htmlInfo.absolutePath(); 
01034         designPicPath += "/";
01035         designPicPath += component_->getVlnv()->toString(".");
01036         designPicPath += ".";
01037         designPicPath += viewName;
01038         designPicPath += ".png";
01039 
01040         QFile designPicFile(designPicPath);
01041 
01042         // if there exists a previous file
01043         if (designPicFile.exists()) {
01044                 designPicFile.remove();
01045         }
01046 
01047         // get the rect that bounds all items on box
01048         QRectF boundingRect = designWidget.itemsBoundingRect();
01049         boundingRect.setHeight(boundingRect.height() + 2);
01050         boundingRect.setWidth(boundingRect.width() + 2);
01051 
01052         // set the size of the picture
01053         QPixmap designPic(boundingRect.size().toSize());
01054 
01055         // create the picture for the component
01056         QPainter painter(&designPic);
01057         painter.fillRect(designPic.rect(), QBrush(Qt::white));
01058         designWidget.scene()->render(&painter, designPic.rect(), boundingRect.toRect());
01059         if (!designPic.save(&designPicFile, "PNG")) {
01060                 emit errorMessage(tr("Could not save picture %1").arg(designPicPath));
01061         }
01062         else {
01063                 pictureList.append(designPicPath);
01064         }
01065 }
